LiveChatObjectAccessConfig.name: LiveChatObjectAccessConfig
LiveChatObjectAccessConfig.description: Represents the action you can perform on a specified object by the Chat API.

AccessType.description: The API action you can perform on the object specified in SobjectType.

ParentId.description: The ID of the associated LiveChatObjectAccessDefinition record.

SobjectType.description: The object that the action specified by AccessType applies to.
